system.description: You compel a Tiny animal to go to a spot you designate. The most common use for this spell is to get an animal to carry a message to your allies. The animal cannot be one tamed or trained by someone else. Using some type of food desirable to the animal as a lure, you call the animal to you. You can mentally impress on the animal a certain place well known to you or an obvious landmark. You can attach some small item or note to the messenger. The animal then goes to the designated location and waits there until the duration of the spell expires.

components.materialDescription: A morsel of food the animal likes
